original_text: And at that time shall Michael stand up, the great prince which standeth for the children of thy people: and there shall be a time of trouble, such as never was since there was a nation even to that same time: and at that time thy people shall be delivered, every one that shall be found written in the book.
korean_text: 그 때에 네 민족을 호위하는 큰 군주 미가엘이 일어날 것이요 또 환난이 있으리니 이는 개국 이래로 그 때까지 없던 환난일 것이며 그 때에 네 백성 중 책에 기록된 모든 자가 구원을 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: And at that time shall Michael stand up
the great prince which standeth for the children of thy people:
sentences.korean_translation: 네 백성의 자녀들을 위해 서있는 큰 군왕이니

sentences.original_text: and there shall be a time of trouble,
such as never was since there was a nation

sentences.korean_translation: 그 때까지도 없었던 것 같은 환난이 있을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and at that time thy people shall be delivered,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에 네 백성이 구원을 받을 것이며

sentences.original_text: every one that shall be found written in the book.
sentences.korean_translation: 책에 기록된 자마다 다 구원을 받으리라
